about_the_game:
This is a world of justice and evil struggle, good and evil two sides sent each other undercover, through a battle of wits to obtain the intelligence of the other side, the eradication of the other side undercover, victory.
  • You will go undercover into the enemy camp.
  • To complete the level, you must obtain intelligence on the enemy's movements.
  • Earn stars by writing quests.
  • Do not be discovered by the enemy, or you will be pursued.
detailed_description:
This is a world of justice and evil struggle, good and evil two sides sent each other undercover, through a battle of wits to obtain the intelligence of the other side, the eradication of the other side undercover, victory.
  • You will go undercover into the enemy camp.
  • To complete the level, you must obtain intelligence on the enemy's movements.
  • Earn stars by writing quests.
  • Do not be discovered by the enemy, or you will be pursued.
legal_notice: All materials are owned by WHM studio, no unpacking, no infringement.
name: 灰色空间 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 / AMD Athlon II X3 455
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Shader model 3.0，NVidia 7600，ATI X1600 Or higher

short_description: This is a world of justice and evil struggle, good and evil two sides sent each other undercover, through a battle of wits to obtain the intelligence of the other side, the eradication of the other side undercover, victory.
